control.description-key: PCF to render a lookup field as a dropdown. (Optional) Include record image, Customize record text, Open record button.

property.name: lookupfield
property.description-key: Lookup field to render as dropdown

property.name: customtext
property.description-key: (Optional) customize display text with any text attributes of the record. put attribute schema names between curly braces {}. Ex. {new_firstname} {new_lastname}. Leave blank to show record primaryname. See documentation for multi-language support.

property.name: customselecttext
property.description-key: (Optional) Custom text for dropdown selector text (default = Select). See documentation for multi-language support.

property.name: dependentlookupfield
property.description-key: (Optional) Dependent Lookup field. Use when Related Records Filtering is set on the Field Properties.

property.name: showRecordImage
property.description-key: Show the record image beside the text.

property.name: showOpenRecordButton
property.description-key: Selected dropdown record renders as a link that opens the record form.

property.name: sortByTextValue
property.description-key: Sort the dropdown list by the displayed text value instead of the default lookup view sorting order.
